intro: Psychotria manillensis, commonly known as the Philippine psychotria, is a flowering plant native to the Philippines. It belongs to the Rubiaceae family, which includes over 13,000 species of flowering plants. The plant is characterized by its small, elliptical leaves and produces small, white or pale green flowers. It is often found in moist, shaded habitats such as mountain forests. The species is of interest to botanists due to its unique ecological role and potential medicinal properties.
